title: World stocks bask in U.S. jobs data glow
text:
World stocks bask in U.S. jobs data glow Monday, March 12, 2018 - 01:24 
World stocks have surged to a two-week high after strong U.S. jobs data at the end of last week helped take the edge of investors' concerns about the potential outbreak of a trade war between the United States and other major economies. Sonia Legg reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
World stocks have surged to a two-week high after strong U.S. jobs data at the end of last week helped take the edge of investors' concerns about the potential outbreak of a trade war between the United States and other major economies. Sonia Legg reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2p8ZOkx
